title: The impending doom of Galaxieretter.
content:
LevelLord00 had her fun and now I shall have mine. Tomorrow, Monday, September 26, 2005, I (Andrew Stoltzfus) will submit myself to pain and suffering, all for the cause of good looking teeth.

Tomorrow I get my wisdom teeth removed. I'll post a big tooth picture as soon as I can.

CAN'T WAIT! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sick.gif[/img] -----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img93.imageshack.us/img93/8904/wid1kx.png[/img]
"Fat people buy lots"

title: Smile!!!
content:
Okay... but... no gory mouths:

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] *drills noises* [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img]

Just the teeth.
I've never seen a wisdom tooth before; this should be interesting. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Smile!!!
content: Oh yes, it's awesome! They took two of mine about two months ago. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]  It's so neat, especially after it if your face gets chipmunkized like mine did![url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Smile!!!
content: Chipmunkized?!?

title: Chipmunkized
content:
I think he means that the sides of his mouth swelled up, and he looked like a chimpmunk who was carrying acorns in its mouth.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Chipmunkized
content: OH, I thought he meant his face went all small...

title: Re: Chipmunkized
content:
On someone as bigheadded as KeenRush that could be lethal.

My face swelled up, but only on one side, I looked like tumour girl.

You're gonna hurt tomorrow Gal, real real bad.

[Everyone in my family has their teeth out, its only a matter of time, but I've got 'em foxed, my wisdom teeth aren't even degummed yet! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] ]A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Chipmunkized
content:
"I think he means that the sides of his mouth swelled up, and he looked like a chimpmunk who was carrying acorns in its mouth."
Exactly.. The term I heard on an irc-channel.

"My face swelled up, but only on one side, I looked like tumour girl."
What do you mean _looked_? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] [url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Drunken Andrew is rambling on. Read at your own risk.
content:
Ok ok ok . I JUST got back like 3 minutes ago. Now I SPECIFICALLY asked them before the operation that I wanted ALL 4 of my teeth. And what did they do? THEY THREW THEM OUT! What the heck! I can't believe it! those morons! Now I can't post an ubercool pic like LL had. I asked them if they could dig them out of the trash and the lady said they couldn't because they thew them in with all the other ones. Like what?! they have a trash can full of these things ? So me still being drunk asked if I could take the whole bag home. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] I got (and still am) SO pissed. And since I was still under the anesthetic and had no control over what I was thinking I started cussing her out REAL bad. (so says my sister) Like I think back now and feel so bad and real sorry.

Ok Andrew... keep your head. I need to organize my thoughts better. Paragraphs are your friends. I'm sure that when I look back at this post tomorrow I'll be like wtf? lol

Anyway the painkiller/anesthetic made me feel so good. They must of put like Marijuana in it or something. I want more right now so bad. I was like so high or something I feel so good.

And yes the chipmunk effect will come lol.

I am just so pissed that I don't have my teeth right now. (I just said that!) Oh and by the way. Anyone got any good movie suggestions I could watch over the next few days? Or maybe some sweet computer games?

(I can't believe I used "lol")-----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img93.imageshack.us/img93/8904/wid1kx.png[/img]
"Fat people buy lots"

title: Re: Drunken Andrew is rambling on. Read at your own risk.
content:
"Ok Andrew... keep your head. I need to organize my thoughts better. Paragraphs are your friends. I'm sure that when I look back at this post tomorrow I'll be like wtf? lol"
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] Andrew? What stuff did they give to you?

Hehe, your post style is all different because of that..

"Anyway the painkiller/anesthetic made me feel so good. They must of put like Marijuana in it or something. I want more right now so bad. I was like so high or something I feel so good."
Lucky you; the one painkiller they used to me just paralyzed my jaw for a while. I didn't feel good or high at all.

Movie ideas.. Hmmm, "Fight Club"? One of my recent favourites..[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: A really good movie idea!!!
content:
When ever I'm down, Barney's Birthday always cheers me up!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

*Can't beleive he just said that in public*

I HATE BARNEY: The "I love you" song just ticks me off!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-barf.gif[/img]

I don't really know off the top of my head. "October Sky" is pretty good, though uses the B-word, and a questionable variation of Darn, but I think you can handle that. It is a really good boy who builds a rocket for a science fair (After Sputnik, before USA), and is a very good story.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: A really good movie idea!!!
content: The Big Lebowski is a brilliant movie, as is Dr. Strangelove, and also Shaun of the Dead.  Donnie Darko is pretty good too, and you might understand it if you're all drugged up.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: hehe
content:
When I got my wisdom teeth taken out, the medication they gave me to help with the swelling actually made the swelling worse... so my face got puffier and puffier as the night went on, until I finally went to sleep out of frustration... woke up and was completely fine. :-D

Donnie Darko was... lacking. I didn't enjoy it. I liked Brazil much much more.

title: Re: hehe
content: I like DD, that's good choice! Anyways, that 'October Sky' sounds fantastic (a bit Keen-like as well), I must see it sometime.. Hopefully I find it..[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: hehe
content:
DD is teh roxxorz movie!

Post a pic of your swolen face Andy, I've never seen a chipmunk before!A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Oh, yeah!
content:
You'd like it KR; the main charectars build this before the USA can build one of theirs that works. It would be in the drama section, and is worth watching.

Najawa: Andy, how ya doing today?

Andy *Face reselmbling a red balloon: Arr arrirr!!! harng er!!!

Najawa: What?

Andy *translation*:What do you think you *censored* doofus?

Najawa [serious]: I don't know what tp think; how are you doing?

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Oh, yeah!
content:
*Reads post from yesterday*
WTF? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

Anyway, thanks for the movie suggestions people. I'll definitely make my sister go rent The Big Lebowski for me and probably Shawn of the Dead. (I would do it myself but I am in NO state to drive.) I believe we have Dr.Strangelove in the basement. Donnie Darko might be cool if I save up all my painkillers and take them before watching it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

And yes... October Sky is AMAZING! I don't know which is better, the book or the film. It is one of the few movies that comes close to the greatness of the novel it is based off of. Definitely a good watch.

Brazil was... good. I wouldn't want to watch it again though. Once is good enough for me.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Post a pic of your swolen face Andy, I've never seen a chipmunk before![hr][/quote]

The swelling was not nearly as bad as what my siblings had. The left side of my face is more swollen then the right.
[img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/9619/chipmunked0dk.jpg[/img] (That might look normal but trust me it is swollen compared to how I usually look)
The swelling doesn't bother me too much, it's the way my body feels. I think I'll stay home again tomorrow.-----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img93.imageshack.us/img93/8904/wid1kx.png[/img]
"Fat people buy lots"

LL: But you haven't made the gooshy noises or the happy hampster hop!

Gal: Look, can't we do something else?

title: Re: Camera:
content:
Actually what I did was I took a lot of pictures and photo manipulated them to put my arm in there. I used 20 separate photos and merged them. It was quite a lot of work but I think it added a great effect to the picture.




We have a gigantic mirror in our living room.-----------------------

title: Hold Noah Webster at Gunpoint:
content:
Najawa:'Mr. Webster, is there such a word as teethy?'

Webster: 'No'

Najawa: *Pulls out gun* 'Now is there?'

Webster: 'Um... er... whoops, here it is..."

Najawa: 'See keeners! Who said violence didn't get anyone anywhere?'

LL: 'I did!!!'

Najawa: *Kills LL* 'See; just like I said. Now our forums are better off.'
